• Event factories incoming! Every week you will have the chance to hunt for Badges and Rewards in the Space and Food Factory!
• We added a new reward for completing event factories very fast!

• Huge Update! Unlock and explore 30 new factories! Become the biggest Factory Tycoon ever!

• Improved prestige system & product upgrades
• Rare Super Workers now boost entire factory districts! Common Super Workers boost entire factories!

• Introducing Super Gems! You can now earn them by unlocking barriers and playing Event Factories. You can also find them in the shop or collect them as a Daily Reward! Start levelling up your Super Workers with them now!
• Make sure to check out your game – a surprise may be waiting for you already!
• We’ve raised the maximum Super Worker level from 10 to 15!

• Introducing a reimagined workflow! Assign workers to each station and activate their special abilities: increasing working speed, increasing the sell value of products, and reducing upgrade costs!

• Don’t forget to activate Epic and Legendary Super Workers to use their show-stealing, unique abilities!
